word: Two angels remained behind. While the disciples were looking at the cloud taking away their Lord, and listening to the music of the angels, "Behold, two men stood by them in white apparel; which also said, Ye men of Galilee, why stand ye gazing up into heaven? this same Jesus, which is taken up from you into heaven, shall so come in like manner as ye have seen Him go into heaven" (Acts 1:10, 11).
